titleStmt.title: The Grand concern of England explained in several proposals offered to the consideration of the Parliament, (1) for payment of publick debts, (2) for advancement and encouragement of trade, (3) for raising the rents of lands ... / by a lover of his countrey, and well-wisher to the prosperity both of the King and kingdoms.
titleStmt.author: Lover of his countrey and well-wisher to the prosperity both of the king and kingdoms.
